data.message: Thank you for sharing our story!! We truly appreciate the support! Unsung Heroes

replies.message:
Dear Facebook 

I'm talking about my friend issue his account last Friday disabled after he reported and sended his original passport after 3 days reply Facebook ur not eligible to use. That is not his mistake someone did but he is mentally disturbed now he is hospital please reopen his account without Facebook iwll miss him please enable his account
His mail
K.r.charanroyal@gmail.com 
Please reply

Inspirational story man, stay motivated and you will make it  to wherever you aim as long as you stay consistent and never give up. I come from similar background, started my first job at walmart 6 years ago, minimum wage graveyard shift, and at the time I was very grateful because I couldnt find any job and I had language barriers. Now I'm a civil engineer and working in a very competitive business that many students with my situation would struggle to make it. If it wasn't for the 100s of rejections I got and all the pointless attempts and tries I had, eventually I made it up the scale, and continue to aim for more success. Best wishes, and hope for continuous success in your journey, and hope to see your next story after opening a restaurant or restaurants. Stay motivated.

Great job...that is truly a wonderful thoughtful gesture that you febin are doing ...you are keeping the respect that we as a people should have for everyone... no matter what position of work that person choose to support themselves and their family
